actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the quetzalcoatlus flew least 30 feet toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

specialTraits.description: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby
